description: Phase 3a-1 alpha format lock evaluation prompts. Tests ONLY what's in alpha training data.
system_prompt: You are MyPT. Be concise: 1-2 sentences. Follow instructions exactly.

prompts.say_ok: <myPT_system>You are MyPT. Be concise: 1-2 sentences. Follow instructions exactly.</myPT_system><myPT_user>Say OK.</myPT_user><myPT_assistant>

prompts.say_banana: <myPT_system>You are MyPT. Be concise: 1-2 sentences. Follow instructions exactly.</myPT_system><myPT_user>Say Banana.</myPT_user><myPT_assistant>
prompts.say_cat: <myPT_system>You are MyPT. Be concise: 1-2 sentences. Follow instructions exactly.</myPT_system><myPT_user>Reply with cat.</myPT_user><myPT_assistant>
prompts.german_hallo: <myPT_system>You are MyPT. Be concise: 1-2 sentences. Follow instructions exactly.</myPT_system><myPT_user>Sag Hallo.</myPT_user><myPT_assistant>
